# dnacenter_network_device_export (Data Source)

It performs create operation on Devices.

- Exports the selected network device to a file

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dnacenter_network_device_export" "example" {
  provider       = dnacenter
  device_uuids   = ["string"]
  id             = "string"
  operation_enum = "string"
  parameters     = ["string"]
  password       = "******"
}
```
